translation.en: ♪ I'm gonna ride ♪
♪ I'm riding free ♪
♪ As long as I am here with you ♪
♪ I feel the spirit within me ♪
♪ Yeah ♪
♪ Yeah ♪
translation.es: SPIRIT CABALGANDO LIBRE UNA NAVIDAD CON SPIRIT

translation.en: ♪ Don't have a care in the world Not today ♪
translation.es: No tengo ninguna preocupación, hoy no

translation.en: ♪ Let's live in the moment ♪
♪ There's no time to waste ♪
♪ Let's smile in the sunshine ♪
♪ And laugh through the rain ♪
♪ Let's dance on the roof ♪
♪ Throw our cares away ♪
♪ There's room in here for everyone ♪
♪ Grab your friends And let's go have some fun ♪
translation.es: Trae a tus amigos y vamos a divertirnos

translation.en: ♪ We'll turn the music up ♪
translation.es: Subiremos el volumen de la música

translation.en: ♪ And have a good time ♪
♪ Everybody, come together now ♪
♪ Feel the love all around ♪
♪ Dance until the sun is down ♪
♪ Everyone is welcome ♪
♪ Wherever you are ♪
♪ You don't have to look far ♪
♪ Hang out underneath the stars ♪
♪ Everyone together ♪
♪ Just come together now ♪
♪ Love is all around ♪
♪ Don't matter where you've been ♪
♪ Everyone's welcome here... ♪
♪ Everyone's welcome here ♪
This...
is my favorite Sally Jessup song.
Her fourth record was my first favorite.
translation.es: Su cuarto disco fue mi favorito.

translation.en: Her third was my second.
Or was her second my third? They're all my favorite.
translation.es: - ¿O fue el segundo disco? - Todos son mis favoritos.

translation.en: -I didn't know that was an option! -[laughter]
-What's this hat doing here? -[gasps]
It's nothing. No one.
Hey, Lucky, my mom said she could use some help organizing her apothecary.
translation.es: Lucky, mi mamá necesita ayuda para organizar su botica.

translation.en: Thanks, Pru.
But as of 8:37 this morning,
after feeding Grayson's chickens and cleaning out Doc Wilkins' fly traps,
translation.es: luego de alimentar los pollos de Grayson y limpiar trampas,

translation.en: I've earned enough money.
Good job, Lucky!
I haven't seen anyone work that hard
since the time you wanted to do all your New Year's resolutions in one day.
translation.es: desde que cumpliste tus promesas de Año Nuevo en un día.

translation.en: Or when you tried to throw me the most perfect birthday party in one day.
translation.es: O cuando organizaste mi fiesta en un día.

translation.en: -Or the time you-- -I get it.
I tend to get a little overexcited about things.
translation.es: Yo tiendo a emocionarme mucho por las cosas.

translation.en: But getting my dad a fiddle made especially for him makes all the flies and chicken poop worth it.
translation.es: Pero mandarle a hacer un violín a papá hace que la caca de pollo valga la pena.

translation.en: Your dad is gonna love it.
translation.es: A tu papá le va a encantar.

translation.en: The Calico City music store said they're delivering it by Mustang Mail.
translation.es: La tienda de música lo enviará por correo Mustang.

translation.en: Everything is right on schedule.
Oh! This Christmas is going to be perfect!
[Lucky] Oh, no! We're late!
[Lucky] We're here! We're here!
-Sorry we're late! -Again.
OK, let's get organized.
Everyone, grab the props you need. Whoa!
-[girls cheering] -[Snips] Yes, yes, yes!
-[Abigail] Yay! -[laughter]
You want to wear a wreath?
-[Señor Carrots braying] -[Snips] Hey, that's my costume!
Señor Carrots, give it back! [grunts]
Excuse us, Snips.
We didn't mean to stand in your way.
What's going on with you two?
-Nothing. -Mary Pat!
Lying is definitely bad.
We don't want coal in our stockings.
translation.es: No queremos carbón en las medias.

translation.en: There's a Nice List and a Naughty List, Snips. -Which do you want to be on? -[Snips] Hm.
translation.es: Hay una lista de buenos y una de traviesos. ¿En cuál quieres estar?

translation.en: It's been torture being extra nice to everyone,
translation.es: Ha sido una tortura ser muy amable con todos,

translation.en: but it will be worth it when Santa brings me the fencing sword I asked for.
translation.es: pero valdrá la pena cuando Papá Noel me traiga la espada que pedí.

translation.en: And when he brings me the fencing mask I asked for.
translation.es: Y cuando a mí me traiga la careta de esgrima.

translation.en: Oh, nuts!
I didn't know I had to be nice every year.
translation.es: No sabía que debo ser bueno todos los años.

translation.en: Does this mean I'm not going to get
the special edition Choo-Choo-Ca-Choo Toy Train
translation.es: el tren edición especial Choo Choo Ca Choo,

translation.en: with the green caboose I asked Santa to bring me?
translation.es: con el vagón verde que le pedí a Papá Noel?

translation.en: Maybe you can pretend the piece of coal you'll get is a toy train.
translation.es: Puedes fingir que el carbón es el tren.

translation.en: Come on, now. Let's stop jabbering and get to rehearsing.
translation.es: ¡Vamos! Dejen de parlotear y vamos a ensayar.

translation.en: Well said, sir!
All your words are good!
-T'was the night before Christmas... Oops. -[out of tune]
-Hold on. -We've been rehearsing for months, Jim.
Don't go changing the lyrics on me now.
Oh, my fiddle needs a tune-up is all.
Maybe Mustang Mail can bring your dad his gift right now.
translation.es: Ojalá le llegara ahora el violín a tu papá.

translation.en: All tuned up! And a-one, and a-two, and a-three!
T'was the night before Christmas,
when all through the house...
Not a creature was stirring...
not even a mouse.
-[Pru] Boysenberry pie? -[Abigail] I made that for Thanksgiving.
translation.es: ¿Pastel de moras? - Lo hice para Acción de Gracias. - Haz tu clásico pastel de durazno.

translation.en: [Pru] Then how about sticking to the classic, Stone peach pie?
translation.es: - Lo hice para Acción de Gracias. - Haz tu clásico pastel de durazno.

translation.en: Every Christmas, I make a pie.
This year, I want to do something different for dessert.
translation.es: Este año quiero hacer algo diferente.

translation.en: -Something new and exciting. -Like what?
Like... Like... cake!
Your family wouldn't see that coming.
[sighs] I'm definitely in a dessert rut.
translation.es: Estoy en líos con el postre.

translation.en: -[nickers] -This elf hat again?
Boomerang, we got to turn this into the Elf Lost-and-Found.
translation.es: Búmerang, llevémoslo a objetos elfos perdidos.

translation.en: Maybe it has a name written on it.
"This hat belongs to so-and-so elf."
-Abigail... it's mine. -[gasps]
Are you a...?
No, I'm not an elf!
When I was five, I took this hat,
translation.es: Cuando tenía cinco años, lo agarré,

translation.en: put it on my head, did a little dance, and helped pass out gifts.
translation.es: me lo puse, bailé y repartí regalos.

translation.en: My parents have made me do it every year since.
translation.es: Mis papás me obligan a hacerlo cada año.

translation.en: No, not "aw!"
[groans] The hat hasn't fit me in years!
It's itchy, it's embarrassing, and I am too old to do the Elf-y Waltz!
translation.es: Me pica, me da vergüenza y estoy vieja para hacer el bailar elfo.

translation.en: PALs! I got a telegram from the music store.
translation.es: Llegó un telegrama de la tienda de música.

translation.en: They won't be able to deliver Dad's fiddle!
translation.es: No podrán traer el violín de papá.

translation.en: But Mustang Mail never fails. What happened?
translation.es: Pero el correo nunca falla. ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: The telegram didn't say.
It just says they'll hold the fiddle for me so I can come pick it up.
translation.es: Solo dijo que yo tenía que ir a recogerlo.

translation.en: But tomorrow is Christmas Eve.
[sighs] What am I gonna do?
Find another gift for your dad?
Or give it to him after Christmas?
Or make him a gift,
like a fiddle out of a box?
Now, that's custom-made, one-of-a-kind.
translation.es: Ese sería único, hecho a la medida.

translation.en: But I really want him to have the fiddle for the Christmas pageant tomorrow night.
translation.es: Pero yo quería que lo tuviera para el acto de Navidad.

translation.en: -Or it's pointless. -Then we'll go to the city to get it.
translation.es: - O no tendría sentido. - Pues vamos a buscarlo.

translation.en: Go into the city?
Yeah, that might work.
We can take the morning train, get the fiddle,
translation.es: Tomamos el tren de la mañana, buscamos el violín,

translation.en: and come back with plenty of time for me to yell, "Surprise! Merry Christmas!"
translation.es: y regresamos a tiempo para gritar: "¡Feliz Navidad!".

translation.en: -All before the pageant in the evening. -[Maricela] Yoo-hoo!
PALMs!
Did I hear you say you're going into the city?
-Yes! -No!
I, too, could use a trip to the city.
I checked the presents under our tree, and I'm not getting everything I asked for,
translation.es: Revisé los regalos debajo del árbol y no son los que pedí.

translation.en: so I'll need to pop into the stores and pick out what I deserve.
translation.es: Quiero ir a comprar lo que merezco.

translation.en: Nay, what I've earned.
translation.es: No, lo que me he ganado.

translation.en: Between the three of you and the horses,
translation.es: Entre ustedes tres y los caballos,

translation.en: you can help carry my surprises.
Sure, whatever, Maricela.
We can't stop her from getting on the train with us.
translation.es: No podemos evitar que suba al tren.

translation.en: Um... I hate to be the voice of reason,
but won't our parents notice we're missing tomorrow?
translation.es: pero nuestros padres verán que no estamos.

translation.en: -[bell dings] -Absolutely not.
Tomorrow is Christmas Eve.
But, Aunt Cora, we have no choice.
I know you, Lucky Prescott.
You'll take the train into the city to pick up a fiddle
translation.es: Irás a la ciudad a recoger un violín

translation.en: and get distracted rescuing a wounded ocelot,
translation.es: y te distraerás rescatando a un ocelote herido,

translation.en: or detaining a jewel thief.
We promise not to do any of those things. How wounded is this ocelot?
translation.es: - Prometemos no hacer eso. - ¿El ocelote está muy herido?

translation.en: Please, Aunt Cora.
We need you to cover for us.
That fiddle is the perfect gift for my dad.
translation.es: El violín es el regalo perfecto para papá.

translation.en: I really, really want him to have it for the Christmas pageant. Please!
translation.es: Quiero que lo tenga para el acto de Navidad. ¡Por favor!

translation.en: Go straight to the music store.
translation.es: Vayan directo a la tienda de música.

translation.en: -Yes! -Yee-hah!
-[gasps] Oh! -Thanks, Aunt Cora!
[to tune of "Jingle Bells"] ♪ Boomerang, Boomerang ♪
♪ Boomerang all the way ♪
♪ Oh, what fun it is to ride on the train To the city today, hey! ♪
translation.es: Qué divertido es viajar hoy En tren a la ciudad

translation.en: All aboard.
[conductor] Next stops: Redbrook, Silverlode,
translation.es: Próximas paradas: Redbrook, Veta de Plata,

translation.en: Biloxi Canyon, Calico City!
OK, PALMs, we are right on schedule.
There's Skull Rock!
[Abigail] The snow looks like bushy eyebrows.
Yeah, it kind of does.
[Snips] Mr. Rock should get those trimmed.
Good one, Snips. [gasps]
Snips? [gasps]
What are you doing here?
I stoled away.
Don't worry, I left a note with Mom and Dad
saying I was shopping with Abigail.
Snips! You have to go back to Miradero.
translation.es: Tuzo, tienes que volver a Miradero.

translation.en: We can't turn around now. We're stuck with him.
[Snips] Thank you, Pru.
I always knew you were the most raisin-able of the girls.
translation.es: Siempre supe que eras la más sensata de las niñas.

translation.en: And maybe the least stinky.
Why are you acting so nice?
Snips is always nice to his friends.
translation.es: Siempre soy amable con mis amigos.

translation.en: -May I offer you a warm beverage? -I could use some chamomile with lemon.
translation.es: - ¿Quieren una bebida caliente? - Yo quiero una manzanilla con limón.

translation.en: OK, sure. Hot chocolate.
-Ooh! Me, too. -Apple cider, please.
I don't have any of those things.
But isn't it nice that I asked?
It still counts!
[conductor] Now arriving, Calico City!
Spirit, you, Chica Linda, Boomerang and Mystery stay here
translation.es: Spirit, Chica Linda, Búmerang y Misterio se quedan

translation.en: while we run to the music store.
-We'll be back soon. -Are you sure it's fine to leave them?
We can't take the horses into the city, and there's more space for them to roam.
translation.es: No podemos llevarlos, y aquí tienen más espacio.

translation.en: Spirit will watch out for Mystery, won't you, boy?
Mystery is perfectly capable of taking care of herself.
translation.es: Misterio es capaz de cuidar de sí misma.

translation.en: -Have fun, Chica Linda. -Don't eat everything in sight, Boomerang.
translation.es: - Adiós, Chica Linda. - No comas nada, Búmerang.

translation.en: -Where did you get that? -I shared it with him.
translation.es: - ¿De dónde sacaste eso? - Lo compartí con él.

translation.en: Snips gives back to the community.
translation.es: Tuzo es bueno con la comunidad.

translation.en: Spread the word!
[Lucky] I love the city at Christmas time.
translation.es: Me encanta la ciudad en Navidad.

translation.en: [Maricela] Oh, my!
Look at those lovely brooches!
-I deserve one of each.
-[Snips] Yeah! -[Abigail] Ooh!
That's it! My dessert rut is over.
translation.es: ¡Listo! Mi problema con el postre acabó.

translation.en: Instead of making something,
I'll get some of these for the Stone Christmas dinner!
translation.es: llevaré estos para la cena de Navidad.

translation.en: [man] Why, thank you.
-[gasps] -I gift you this cheery balloon...
from the happiness of my heart.
translation.es: con todo el amor de mi corazón.

translation.en: Um... OK, thanks.
I'll carry it for you.
I'm generous and helpful.
Two for one!
I fell for that. I've got no one to blame but myself.
translation.es: Me lo creí. Soy la única culpable.

translation.en: Come on, PALMs and Snips, let's stay on track.
translation.es: Vamos, PALMS y Tuzo, sigamos el plan.

translation.en: To the music store!
OK. Where did the... Oh. Mm.
Merry Christmas Eve to you, too, Polly.
translation.es: Feliz Nochebuena para ti también, Polly.

translation.en: Now, just because you're an adorable tiny tot
doesn't mean you get to taste the figgy pudding before everyone else.
translation.es: pero no puedes probar el pudín antes que los demás.

translation.en: Cora, you old softie.
Polly is a girl of her own volition.
I cannot control her.
She must take after her sister. Where is Lucky, anyway?
translation.es: Se parece a su hermana. ¿Dónde está Lucky?

translation.en: Probably sleeping in.
Lucky, time for breakfast!
Oh, don't bother bellowing like a street peddler.
translation.es: No grites como un vendedor ambulante.

translation.en: Lucky woke up about an hour or so ago.
She and her friends went for an early-morning ride.
translation.es: Se fue temprano a cabalgar con sus amigas.

translation.en: Something about uh collecting pine cones for decorations.
translation.es: Iban a recoger piñas de pino para decorar.

translation.en: There are bundles of pine cones in the forest. I'm sure they didn't go far.
translation.es: Hay muchas en el bosque, no deben haber ido muy lejos.

translation.en: [Lucky] It's perfect!
Just like I planned.
-Let's go. -Yes!
Like the wind, Señor Balloon!
So, we'll hop on the next train and get home before-- [gasps]
translation.es: Nos iremos en tren y llegaremos antes...

translation.en: -Look! -[Abigail] Oh, my sweet jellybeans!
[Pru] There's a Sally Jessup concert in the Grand Theater, today!
translation.es: Hoy hay un concierto de Sally Jessup en El Gran Teatro.

translation.en: I adore Sally Jessup.
Especially the song that goes...
♪ If we just come together now ♪
♪ Feel the love that's all around ♪
translation.es: Sentiremos el amor que nos rodea

translation.en: -Sounds different when you sing it. -Oh, thank you.
translation.es: - Suena distinta si tú la cantas. - Gracias.

translation.en: Perfect!
OK, new plan: We'll go to the concert and take the three o'clock train back.
translation.es: Nuevo plan: iremos al concierto y tomaremos el tren de las tres.

translation.en: You want to skip the pageant?
Normal Snips would say "yes" to that plan.
translation.es: El Tuzo normal diría que sí,

translation.en: But Good Boy Snips says, "I'm telling!"
translation.es: pero Tuzo el bueno las va a acusar.

translation.en: Señor Balloon agrees with me. Just who are you going to tell in the middle of the city?
translation.es: - El Señor Globo está de acuerdo. - ¿Con quién nos acusarás en la ciudad?

translation.en: We don't have to skip anything.
translation.es: No hay que faltar al acto.

translation.en: If we take the three o'clock train, we'll still make it back in time.
translation.es: Si tomamos el tren a las tres, llegaremos a tiempo.

translation.en: Are you sure this is a good idea? I love Sally Jessup, but--
translation.es: ¿Será una buena idea? Me encanta Sally Jessup, pero...

translation.en: Since the pageant doesn't start until the evening, we do have the time.
translation.es: El acto empieza en la noche, tenemos tiempo.

translation.en: Besides, Sally would never perform in Miradero.
translation.es: Además, Sally nunca se presentará en Miradero,

translation.en: And who knows when she'll even be back in Calico City?
translation.es: y quizá no vuelva a Ciudad Cálico.

translation.en: This might be our only chance of ever seeing Sally Jessup sing in person.
translation.es: Esta podría ser nuestra única ocasión de ver a Sally Jessup.

translation.en: Ever!
-Let's do it! -Yay!
-Yeah! -[Maricela] This is so great!
Yes! Here we are.
We'll need five tickets.
Au contraire. We only need four tickets.
Maricela, we need five tickets.
One, two, three, four...
-Huh? -[Abigail gasps] Snips!
Snips!
[Pru] Snips!
Snips!
Boy? Boy?
Snips! Snips!
Oh, where is he?
Don't worry, Abigail. We'll retrace our steps.
We'll find him.
-Snips? -Small redhead!
-Snips! -Snips!
[gasps] Look!
[Pru] It's Señor Balloon!
-Snips! -Little child!
[Abigail] Come back! Snips! Snips! Wait, Snips!
Hiya! I'm Ivan.
-I'm traveling with Nana to Biloxi Canyon. -[Nana] Come along now, Ivan.
translation.es: - Voy con mi Nana a Cañón Biloxi. - Vamos, Iván.

translation.en: Hurry it up.
Wait. Ivan, where did you get this balloon?
translation.es: Espera. Iván, ¿de dónde sacaste este globo?

translation.en: A boy with poufy hair traded me for directions.
translation.es: Un chico me lo cambió por una dirección.

translation.en: Directions to where?
It's serious-talk time, Snips to Santa.
translation.es: Hablemos en serio, de Tuzo a Papá Noel.

translation.en: I know I'm falling short in the nice department,
translation.es: Sé que no cumplo con portarme bien,

translation.en: but instead of being nice, what if I trade you something?
translation.es: pero en vez de ser amable, hagamos un trato.

translation.en: You need a helper?
I got a sister who would make a real good Elf-agail.
translation.es: Tengo una hermana que podría ser un buen elfo.

translation.en: [Abigail] Snips!
-[Pru] Snips! -Snips! Snips.
-There you are! -We were so worried.
Uh... I meant the general "we" - them. Your sister.
translation.es: Bueno, no a todas. A tu hermana.

translation.en: You can't run off without telling us!
That's very, very bad!
No! I didn't mean to be bad.
I was just trying to be nice by not bothering you
translation.es: Quería ser amable y no molestarlas

translation.en: while you talked about your boring things.
I was gonna meet you at the depot later.
translation.es: Yo luego iba a ir a la estación.

translation.en: Come on, Snips, we should go.
We're so sorry, Santa. This won't affect which list we're on, right?
translation.es: - Lo siento. - ¿Esto afectará en qué lista estamos?

translation.en: But this is why I came all the way to the city.
translation.es: Por esto fue que vine a la ciudad.

translation.en: Santa, what's your answer about that trade?
translation.es: Papá Noel, ¿qué me dices del trato?

translation.en: She's real good at wrapping gifts.
Santa only brings gifts to children who are nice, little one.
translation.es: Papá Noel solo les da regalos a los que son amables.

translation.en: You drive a hard bargain.
Come on, Snips. I'm sure Santa got all 25 of your letters.
translation.es: Vamos, Tuzo. Seguro que Papá Noel recibió tus 25 cartas.

translation.en: And the ten that I sent.
Look, Pru. He seems happy in his elf hat.
translation.es: Mira, Pru. Parece feliz con su gorro de elfo.

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, yeah. He's an elf. I'm not.
translation.es: Bueno, sí, es un elfo. Yo no.

translation.en: Not with that attitude.
Come on!
[Pru] Sold out?
Good plan, ladies. Well, back to Miradero. Huh?
translation.es: Buen plan, niñas. Bueno, volvamos a Miradero.

translation.en: Oh, but we're so close!
I just want to get a glimpse of Sally Jessup in person.
translation.es: Quiero ver a Sally Jessup en persona.

translation.en: -Me, too. -I know.
I, as well.
-[thud] -[man] Move it along, Lulu.
Quit dragging the tinsel, Hacksaw.
Let's hurry!
[sighs] I got to find a Christmas gift for the wife after setup,
translation.es: Debo buscar un regalo para mi esposa,

translation.en: and I don't have a clue.
Careful, you guys! This stuff's expensive!
I have a plan.
Why I always got to bring in the heavy stuff?
Hacksaw carried in tinsel. He's bigger than me!
translation.es: Hacksaw carga el oropel, es más grande que yo.

translation.en: They don't want it here, they can move it themselves.
translation.es: ¿No lo quieren aquí? Que lo muevan ellos.

translation.en: [Abigail] I don't think we should be in here.
[Pru] We'll get a quick look at Sally Jessup, then leave.
translation.es: Vemos rápidamente a Sally y nos vamos.

translation.en: No harm in that.
Now, what do women like?
[woman singing] ♪ Snow falls from the sky... ♪
[gasps] Is that...?
♪ It's a-time to say goodbye... ♪
translation.es: Es el momento de decir adiós

translation.en: That's Sally Jessup.
I don't know this song, but it's my new favorite.
translation.es: No conozco la canción, pero ya es mi favorita.

translation.en: ♪ The world feels so right ♪
No, it doesn't. It... It feels wrong.
translation.es: No, no es verdad. Se siente mal.

translation.en: I just can't get it.
Let's go talk to her.
Hey! What are you bunch of kids doing back here?
Uh... Well...
I still can't believe it!
We were this close to talking to Sally Jessup!
We got to hear her sing a little bit.
That's kind of like a concert.
Well, at least we'll make it back in plenty of time.
translation.es: Bueno, al menos regresaremos a tiempo.

translation.en: [Pru] Come on, Chica Linda.
Ooh! So pretty!
[conductor] Due to a snowstorm that's hit Biloxi Canyon,
translation.es: Debido a una nevada en Cañón Biloxi,

translation.en: Silverlode and Redbrook, this train has been delayed.
translation.es: Veta de Plata y Redbrook, se retrasará la salida.

translation.en: Delayed?
Don't worry. My dad says this happens all the time.
translation.es: Mi papá dice que esto siempre pasa.

translation.en: We won't be here that long.
I can't believe we've been here for this long!
translation.es: No puedo creer que tengamos tanto tiempo aquí.

translation.en: We have got to get home!
[Aunt Cora scoffs] Stop fidgeting, Mary Pat.
My apologies.
I will be better.
Sounds beautiful, Mr. Prescott.
You can hear the harmonic texture of your fiddle.
translation.es: Se aprecia la textura armónica del violín.

translation.en: [chuckles] Thanks, Bianca.
-Cora, have you seen Lucky? -Anyone seen Pru?
translation.es: - ¿Has visto a Lucky? - ¿Han visto a Pru?

translation.en: She left a note saying she was picking pine cones or some such nonsense.
translation.es: Dejó una nota diciendo que estaba recogiendo piñas de pino.

translation.en: Oh, you know how those girls get distracted by the simplest things.
translation.es: Ya sabes que esas niñas se distraen con cualquier cosa.

translation.en: I'm sure they're on their way.
[sighs] Come on, come on, come on!
Let's go!
-Yes! We might make it after all! -I can't believe it!
-[Abigail] I'm so happy! -[Maricela] Oh! What a relief!
[conductor] Next stops: Biloxi Canyon, Silverlode, Redbrook,
translation.es: Próximas paradas: Cañón Biloxi, Veta de Plata, Redbrook

translation.en: Miradero.
Fetching hat, ma'am.
You have something in your teeth, sir.
That may seem rude,
but it's actually ruder to not say anything.
translation.es: pero sería grosero no decir nada.

translation.en: Share the news. Snips is nice! [gasps]
translation.es: Compartan la noticia de que Tuzo es amable.

translation.en: Señor Balloon!
I've missed you!
Are they treating you well?
Hiya! I'm Ivan.
I'm traveling with Nana to Biloxi Canyon.
translation.es: Viajo con mi Nana a Cañón Biloxi.

translation.en: I know. You said that when we met.
translation.es: Lo sé. Me lo dijiste cuando nos conocimos.

translation.en: We just passed Birchwood Junction. That means we're close to Miradero.
translation.es: Ya pasamos la intersección Abedul. Estamos cerca de Miradero.

translation.en: [Sally singing] ♪ Snow falls from the sky... ♪
Is that...?
♪ It's a-time to say goodbye... ♪
-[Pru] It can't be! -[Abigail] Oh, my gosh!
♪ The lights twinkle so bright ♪
♪ The world feels so right ♪
translation.es: Y el mundo se siente bien

translation.en: [in unison] Sally Jessup!
Those girls promised they wouldn't be late. Oh, the audience is getting restless.
translation.es: - Ellas prometieron no llegar tarde. - El público está impaciente.

translation.en: Perhaps we should postpone the performance.
We can't postpone. Everyone is expecting a show!
translation.es: No podemos. Todos esperan el show.

translation.en: Al's right. Hopefully the girls are on the way.
translation.es: Sí. Las niñas deben estar por llegar.

translation.en: Until they get here, we'll improvise.
Welcome to Miradero's First Annual Christmas Eve Pageant!
translation.es: Bienvenidos al primer acto anual de Nochebuena de Miradero.

translation.en: -[cheering and applause] -And a-one, and a-two, and a-three!
T'was the night before Christmas, when all through the house...
translation.es: "Era Nochebuena, cuando en toda la casa..."

translation.en: ...not a creature was stirring, not even a mouse.
translation.es: "...no se oía ni un ruido, ni siquiera un ratón".

translation.en: Here come the sugar plums
dancing in your heads.
[man] Aw! Now, that's cute!
Psst! Kate! I need you to cover for me backstage.
translation.es: Kate, necesito que me cubras tras bastidores.

translation.en: I don't know any of the cues, Cora.
What does it matter? Half the performers aren't here anyway.
translation.es: No importa. La mitad de los actores no están.

translation.en: [Sally] ♪ Let's make a Christmas wish ♪
♪ Hold our hands and ♪
And catch a fish?
Music comes from the heart.
And my heart's not in it.
Not since my life's changed so much.
translation.es: No desde que mi vida cambió.

translation.en: You're doing great, Sal.
You'll finish that song when the time is right.
I haven't put out a new song in a year.
translation.es: Tengo un año que no saco una nueva.

translation.en: [scoffs] Your fans would line up around the block to see you,
even if you never wrote another song.
You know I don't write songs to sell tickets.
translation.es: No escribo canciones para vender boletos,

translation.en: I write songs to share my feelings,
translation.es: sino para compartir lo que siento

translation.en: and, you know, hopefully inspire this topsy-turvy world a little bit.
translation.es: y para inspirar a este mundo que está un poco loco.

translation.en: Right now, what I'm feeling isn't very inspirational.
translation.es: Lo que ahora siento no me inspira mucho.

translation.en: [Lucky] There she is. Sally Jessup!
-[girls gasp] -You again?
-[Sally] Who is it, Ronny? -Just a bunch of kids.
They tried to sneak into your concert today.
Oh, my gosh! Sally Jessup!
We love you! We're your biggest fans!
We only snuck in to try to talk to you, I swear.
translation.es: Solo entramos para hablar contigo, lo juro.

translation.en: -And now we're here talking to you! -All your songs are my favorite song.
translation.es: - Y lo logramos. - Tus canciones son mis favoritas.

translation.en: Turns out, I don't need to pick just one.
Mine is the one that goes... [sings high note]
We like it when you sing it, Sally.
translation.es: Nos gusta cuando tú la cantas.

translation.en: Can I call you Sally? -I can't call you Sally! Can I? -[Sally giggles]
translation.es: ¿Puedo llamarte Sally? No puedo llamarte Sally. ¿Puedo?

translation.en: You "bunch of kids" have names?
I'm Pru. That's Abigail.
Maricela Gutierrez.
-Pleasure is mine. -My name's Lucky.
We did try to buy tickets to your concert, but there was a Santa thing,
translation.es: Queríamos comprar boletos, pero vimos a Papá Noel,

translation.en: then we lost Snips, and we followed a red balloon--
translation.es: perdimos a Tuzo y seguimos un globo.

translation.en: Um... He has a name. It's Señor Balloon.
Well, it's nice to meet you, Señor Balloon.
Anyway, it was sold out.
I can't deny my biggest fans a performance, right?
translation.es: No les negaré una actuación a mis fanes.

translation.en: -Take a seat. -Wahoo!
Let me just tune this a bit.
[Ronny] Hang on tight!
-[rumbling stops] -[Ronny] Is everyone all right?
-[both gasp] -Is everyone OK?
[gasps] Yeah, I'm OK. I think so.
translation.es: - Sí, yo estoy bien. - Creo que sí.

translation.en: I'm all right. Snips, are you OK?
Snips is OK!
[gasps] Oh, no!
-Is anyone coming to help us? -Where do we go?
-What should we do? -The tracks are covered in snow.
This train isn't going anywhere.
I'm not sure which direction's the quickest or...
translation.es: No sé cuál camino sería el más rápido

translation.en: even which town we should head toward.
[Lucky] I know this area.
We passed Birchwood Junction, so it's only about a two-hour ride to Miradero.
translation.es: Pasamos la intersección Abedul, así que Miradero está como a dos horas.

translation.en: We'll have to walk.
-[others] Walk? -Are you serious?
It is cold out here, and I did not wear the proper shoes for this.
translation.es: Hace frío, y no tengo los zapatos adecuados.

translation.en: We don't have a choice!
It's getting dark.
Miradero is the closest town.
translation.es: Miradero es el pueblo más cercano.

translation.en: Lucky's right. It's our only chance.
You expect all of us to walk the whole way there?
Oh, Hacksaw, you gave me the heavy end to hold.
translation.es: Hacksaw, me diste el lado más pesado.

translation.en: This just may work.
Come on, this way.
[Abigail] Let me help.
-Thank you. -Up you go.
Come on, don't worry. Stay warm.
translation.es: Ven, no te preocupes. Mantente caliente.

translation.en: Easy does it.
Thank you.
-[man grunts] Here we go. -Come on, everyone.
This isn't so bad.
We'll be in Miradero in no time.
[Jim] Cora?
Where did the girls really go?
Cora?
[Ronny] So far, so good. Just keep walking.
I can't believe I'm talking to the Sally Jessup.
translation.es: No puedo creer que esté hablando con Sally Jessup.

translation.en: Are you on tour, Sally?
You can't call her "Sally" like you're best friends.
translation.es: No la llames "Sally", no es tu amiga.

translation.en: You can all call me Sally.
OK... Sally! [chuckles]
Nope, not ready for that yet.
-[Sally laughs] -Where are you headed for Christmas?
Hm. That fiddle is prettier than a peacock on parade.
translation.es: Ese violín es más lindo que un pavo real en un desfile.

translation.en: Is it yours?
It's a Christmas gift for my dad.
I hoped to get it to him tonight so he could play it in our Christmas pageant.
translation.es: Quería dárselo para que lo tocara en el acto.

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen now.
Oh, I'm sorry, Lucky.
What's the matter, boy?
What's that?
Earthquake?
[Lucky] Bison!
[Sally] Lucky, you all right?
[Ronny] Nana! I got you!
[Abigail] Snips!
Are you OK?
Is everyone all right?
[George] Where are you, Mom?
[Maricela] Where is everyone?
Snips! Are you OK?
I'm scared. Where are you?
Where are you?
-[George] Help! Help! -[Ronny] Sally? Sal, where are you?
-I can't see! -[Nana] Oh, dear! Oh, dear!
♪ Keep looking up ♪
♪ You're not alone ♪
♪ Just hear my voice ♪
♪ And always know ♪
♪ You'll be all right ♪
♪ Nothing to fear ♪
♪ Remember love is strong enough ♪
translation.es: Recuerden que el amor es muy fuerte

translation.en: ♪ Keep looking up ♪
That was beautiful.
I've never heard that song before.
Is it new?
It's old. It's very, very old.
It's a song my mom made up.
She used to sing it to me whenever I was sad,
translation.es: Me la cantaba cuando yo estaba triste

translation.en: or mad, or scared, or impatient.
translation.es: o enojada, o asustada, o impaciente.

translation.en: Anyway, what are we aiming to do now?
I think we have to keep walking.
I say we form a search party.
I'm worried about the girls, too.
But, Jim, if we go out there,
we risk getting lost as well.
We can't just sit here and wait all night.
translation.es: No podemos esperar toda la noche.

translation.en: Only until the storm lets up.
translation.es: Hasta que la tormenta se calme.

translation.en: For all we know, the kids are sitting by a cozy fire, roasting marshmallows.
translation.es: Podrían estar sentadas en una fogata asando malvaviscos.

translation.en: -Are we there yet? -Not yet, Ivan.
[George] How much further?
[woman] I'm just so tired.
Look! We can use that tunnel for shelter!
Come on! Everyone, follow me!
-[Ronny] Let's go, Sal. -[Sally] Thank goodness!
[man] OK, come on!
-[woman] It is so cold. -[coughing]
[Lucky] Everything's going to be OK.
We'll sleep here and figure out what to do in the morning.
translation.es: Dormiremos aquí, mañana veremos qué hacer.

translation.en: I like that thinking.
This cold weather is turning my soft skin slightly less soft.
translation.es: Este frío hace que mi suave piel sea menos suave.

translation.en: Oh, well, let me turn off the snow, make sure your skin is comfortable.
translation.es: Pues voy a apagar la nieve para que tu piel esté cómoda.

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, they're going to find 34 human ice pops in here.
What do we do? Everyone's freezing.
We need a fire.
I know how to make one. Come on, Abigail.
-Here's some wood we can use. -Here, too. But it's pretty damp.
translation.es: - Aquí hay leña. - Aquí también, pero está húmeda.

translation.en: -Is this going to be enough? -Let's go, Abigail.
We found some wood, but it's sopping wet.
These little twigs can't start a fire.
We need a big piece of wood - dry wood.
translation.es: Necesitamos un trozo de madera seca.

translation.en: I'm cold.
-I don't know if I'm gonna make it. -It is so cold.
translation.es: - No sé si aguante. - Hace mucho frío.

translation.en: -[Lucky] Here. -Lucky, no.
I know. But we need a fire... or we won't survive the night.
translation.es: Lo sé. Pero necesitamos fuego, o no sobreviviremos.

translation.en: [Lucky] Sorry, Dad.
[Abigail] Lucky...
we're sorry about your dad's fiddle.
Hopefully, the fire will last all night.
translation.es: Ojalá el fuego dure hasta mañana.

translation.en: [Snips] Señor Balloon and I are starving!
translation.es: ¡El Señor Globo y yo tenemos hambre!

translation.en: Sorry, Snips. We don't have any food.
translation.es: Lo siento, Tuzo, no tenemos comida.

translation.en: Wait!
[gasps] Ivan, look!
Food!
Didn't imagine I'd serve Christmas dessert in a dark cave,
translation.es: No imaginé comer postre navideño en una cueva,

translation.en: but I'm sure they'll taste just as good.
Sir?
Mm! Chocolate babka. What else you got in there?
Macaroons, hamantaschen.
Reminds me of treats Ma made.
Her recipe for apple cake - best ever.
translation.es: Su pastel de manzana era el mejor.

translation.en: I'm gonna bake one this year.
translation.es: Este año voy a hornear uno.

translation.en: -So, you know how to make these? -Mm-hm.
I give Mother, Father and Cook a wish list.
translation.es: Les di a mamá y a papá una lista de deseos.

translation.en: That way, I get exactly what I want, and they need not stress.
translation.es: Así, recibo lo que quiero, y ellos no se estresan.

translation.en: [sighs] But this year, I don't know what went wrong.
translation.es: Pero este año, no sé qué salió mal.

translation.en: I never know what to give my wife.
translation.es: No sé qué darle a mi esposa.

translation.en: She's real fancy.
Honestly, Maricela, I don't know what she sees in a big lug like me.
translation.es: La verdad, Maricela, no sé qué ve en un tonto como yo.

translation.en: I hope she likes what I got her this year.
translation.es: Ojalá le guste lo que le compré.

translation.en: I'm sure she'll love whatever you bought her.
translation.es: Le gustará lo que le compraste.

translation.en: Yeah?
You think she'll like this?
Hey!
You're right, she'd hate it.
Definitely.
It's so embarrassing. The thing doesn't even fit me anymore.
translation.es: Es vergonzoso. Ni siquiera me queda bien.

translation.en: But I can't tell my parents I'm done wearing the elf hat... can I?
translation.es: Pero no puedo decirles a mis padres que no quiero usar el gorro de elfo.

translation.en: Well, when I was a child, every year,
translation.es: Cuando yo era niña, cada año,

translation.en: my parents folded a star hat out of paper...
translation.es: mis papás hacían una estrella de papel

translation.en: placed it on my head.
I'd have to wear it all Christmas Day.
translation.es: Tenía que usarla todo el día.

translation.en: They called me their "Little Christmas Tree."
Bet you hated it.
[groans] With a passion.
Then I had children of my own.
Every year, I folded a star hat,
translation.es: Cada año, hacía un gorro de estrella

translation.en: stuck it on their heads.
And now we do it to Ivan.
translation.es: Ahora se lo hago a Iván.

translation.en: [laughs] Nana!
That elf hat's not for you.
translation.es: Ese gorro no es para ti,

translation.en: It's for your mum and dad.
translation.es: es para tu mamá y tu papá.

translation.en: And when you have kids,
you'll make them do some daffy tradition, too.
translation.es: también les transmitirás una tradición tonta.

translation.en: And do you know what else they have at Biloxi Canyon?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué más hay en Cañón Biloxi?

translation.en: They have lollipops, melted cheese, flags,
houses, my parents, rainbows, and dirt.
translation.es: casas, mis padres, arcoíris y tierra.

translation.en: Oh, boy. Let's talk about something else.
What did you ask Santa for?
Lollipops, melted cheese, flags, houses...
You think you'll get all those things because you're nice?
translation.es: ¿Crees que recibirás todo eso porque eres amable?

translation.en: -Yep. -But what does "being nice" even mean?
It could mean different things to different people.
translation.es: Para cada quien significa algo distinto.

translation.en: I think being nice means you do something good for someone
translation.es: Significa hacer algo bueno por alguien

translation.en: without wanting anything back.
My point exactly.
-Hey, Sally. -Oh, hey, Lucky.
You should record that song. The one your mom sang to you.
translation.es: Graba esa canción, la que tu mamá te cantaba.

translation.en: The world would want to hear it.
Yeah, I hadn't thought about that song in a month of Sundays.
translation.es: Tenía mucho tiempo que no pensaba en esa canción.

translation.en: Nothing's been the same since she passed away last Christmas.
translation.es: Nada es igual desde que murió el año pasado.

translation.en: These are my mom's boots.
When I wear them, I feel like she's still here with me.
translation.es: Cuando me las pongo, siento que aún está conmigo.

translation.en: Spirit?
What is it, boy?
[gasps] Oh, no!
[man] What's going on?
The way out of the tunnel is completely covered in snow.
translation.es: La salida del túnel está cubierta de nieve.

translation.en: If we don't leave, we'll be trapped.
translation.es: Si no nos vamos, quedaremos atrapados.

translation.en: How are we gonna get out?
Somebody better have an idea!
-Kid's right. -We have to do something.
-I don't know what to do. -Yeah, he's right. What are we gonna do?
translation.es: - No sé qué hacer. - Tiene razón. ¿Qué vamos a hacer?

translation.en: Great idea, Spirit!
[man] Come on!
-Let me help. -[Lucky] Keep digging!
We're almost there!
[Lucky] Pru, grab this!
Come on, everybody!
-[Lucky] Let's go! Keep going! -[Abigail] Come on, everybody!
[Abigail] Everything's snowed over.
What do we do now?
Come on!
Are you serious? We're not gonna make it up there.
translation.es: ¿Hablas en serio? No llegaremos hasta allá arriba.

translation.en: Miradero's on the other side, I'm sure of it.
translation.es: Miradero está del otro lado. Estoy segura.

translation.en: Come on, everyone! We can do this.
We're almost there, I promise.
If we survive this, I promise to do all the good things all the time,
translation.es: Si sobrevivimos, prometo hacer cosas buenas todo el tiempo,

translation.en: not just the day before Christmas,
and not just because of presents.
translation.es: y no solo por los regalos.

translation.en: Who's gonna do the Elf-y Waltz if we don't make it back?
-Nana! Are you OK? -Gotcha! Here we go.
I just need a moment.
[grunts] Me, too.
Lucky, how much further to your town?
[sighs] I...
I don't know.
I've never actually gone up this mountain before.
translation.es: Es que nunca he subido esta montaña.

translation.en: [Snips] Now what are we gonna do?
[gasps] It's Skull Rock! That means we're close to Miradero!
translation.es: - ¡Es Roca Cráneo! - Estamos cerca de Miradero.

translation.en: With the snow, Skull Rock looks like Santa!
translation.es: Roca Cráneo se parece a Papá Noel.

translation.en: Come on, everybody! We're almost there!
Let's head to Santa Rock!
Since the snow has let up, we'll head toward Silverlode.
translation.es: Dejó de nevar, iremos hacia Veta de Plata.

translation.en: Al, you head toward Cedar Gulch.
translation.es: Al, ve a Barranca del Cedro.

translation.en: Cora and I will stay here in case they return.
translation.es: Cora y yo nos quedaremos, por si regresan.

translation.en: Right, Cora?
Cora?
What do you see?
It's what I hear.
Singing.
I can hear it, too, now.
[girls singing] ♪ Nothing to fear ♪
♪ Remember love is strong enough ♪
translation.es: Recuerda que el amor es muy fuerte

translation.en: ♪ Keep looking up ♪
-Lucky! -Dad!
Father!
[Snips] We survived!
I'll wear that elf hat every day.
translation.es: Usaré el gorro todos los días.

translation.en: And that's when I saw all these desserts I'd never heard of!
translation.es: Vi muchos postres que no conocía.

translation.en: I was quite brave. I never let the cold bother me, not once.
translation.es: Fui muy valiente. Nunca dejé que el frío me molestara, ni una vez.

translation.en: Now that we survived, Good Boy Snips is here to stay.
translation.es: Como sobrevivimos, Tuzo el bueno llegó para quedarse.

translation.en: Everyone, you'll stay in Miradero for the night.
translation.es: Esta noche, todos dormirán en Miradero.

translation.en: You're all welcome in our homes.
[Lucky] I'm sorry I missed the pageant.
translation.es: Siento no haber ido al acto.

translation.en: I went to the city to get you this one-of-a-kind fiddle.
translation.es: Fui a la ciudad a comprarte un violín único.

translation.en: It was the perfect replacement for your beat-up one.
translation.es: El remplazo perfecto para tu violín viejo.

translation.en: [sighs] But nothing went as planned.
Yeah, this fella is beat-up, isn't it?
That's where I dropped it when playing a song for you.
translation.es: Se me cayó cuando te tocaba una canción.

translation.en: You were a month old.
It was the first time you smiled at me.
translation.es: Fue la primera vez que me sonreíste.

translation.en: And that's when three-year-old Lucky used this fiddle as an oar
translation.es: Y esto fue cuando Lucky, de tres años, lo usó como remo

translation.en: in her couch-canoe.
Dad...
The most memorable moments are ones that are never planned.
translation.es: Los momentos inolvidables nunca se planean,

translation.en: And this old thing is filled with memorable moments.
translation.es: y este viejo violín tiene muchos.

translation.en: This fiddle, it is one-of-a-kind.
Oh, Dad.
Now, go to sleep, sweet pea.
Will everyone be able to get home tomorrow?
Well, the snow has stopped.
Though, most of the tracks are still covered.
My guess is no.
Everyone's Christmas plans are ruined.
I think, for now, everyone's relieved to have a warm place to sleep.
translation.es: Creo que están aliviados de tener dónde dormir.

translation.en: We'll make the best of the situation.
"Make the best of the situation."
Wake up! Rise and shine!
Good morning! Wake up, everyone!
[Abigail] Up and at 'em!
-[Lucky] Get up, get up, get up! -Huh?
[Abigail] Good morning, everybody.
[in unison] Surprise!
Merry Christmas!
My sword!
-My mask! -Yay!
Oh! These look delicious!
Did you two make all this?
Yep! We sure did.
Your wife will adore the embroidered hankie.
translation.es: A su esposa le encantará el pañuelo bordado.

translation.en: Don't forget to tell her the perfume is imported, hm?
translation.es: Y dígale que el perfume es importado.

translation.en: You bunch of kids are all right.
♪ Look at me-me, look at me-me ♪
♪ I'm an elf-y... ♪
[laughs] Gets me every time.
♪ Look at me-me, look at me-me I'm an elf-y ♪
Yay! Santa brought me a train!
It's the special edition Choo-Choo-Ca-Choo Toy Train with the green caboose!
translation.es: Es el tren edición especial Choo Choo Ca Choo con el vagón verde.

translation.en: Isn't that the train Santa brought you?
Good Boy Snips is here to stay!
You think he wants something in return?
I don't know how long I can keep this up.
translation.es: No sé cuánto tiempo podré seguir así.

translation.en: Hey, Sally.
I'm sure you had somewhere more glamorous to be for Christmas,
translation.es: Seguro querrías estar en un lugar más glamuroso,

translation.en: but I hope you're having fun.
I didn't really have any plans for the holidays.
translation.es: No tenía ningún plan para Navidad.

translation.en: I kind of wanted to forget this one, you know?
But that is gonna be hard to do.
translation.es: pero eso va a ser muy difícil.

translation.en: You and your friends really helped us pull through last night.
translation.es: Anoche, tú y tus amigas realmente nos ayudaron.

translation.en: And then you put all this together for everyone.
translation.es: Y luego organizaron todo esto para todos.

translation.en: You are truly inspirational.
Oh, my gosh!
Sally Jessup just said I was "inspirational!"
translation.es: Sally Jessup dijo que soy inspiradora.

translation.en: Hey, you want to hear my new song?
Do I!
This one goes out to the brave passengers for helping one another survive,
translation.es: Esta la dedico a los pasajeros que se ayudaron a sobrevivir,

translation.en: and to the people of Miradero for opening their homes.
translation.es: a la gente de Miradero por recibirnos en sus casas

translation.en: Last but not least, here's to you,
my biggest fans.
♪ The bells are ringing The snow is falling ♪
translation.es: Las campanas están sonando La nieve está cayendo

translation.en: ♪ I hear the carolers... ♪
Yay, Sally!
-She said I can call her that. -This is my favorite song!
translation.es: - La puedo llamar así. - ¡Es mi canción favorita!

translation.en: I can't believe it!
Sally Jessup is performing in Miradero!
And you said she'd never play here.
I was wrong. All it took was a train derailing on Christmas Eve.
translation.es: Sí. Gracias a que el tren se descarriló en Nochebuena.

translation.en: ♪ Can you feel it ♪
♪ The magic all around? ♪
♪ Can you hear it? ♪
♪ It's such a beautiful sound ♪
♪ If you believe it ♪
♪ Hope will always be found ♪
♪ And if you dream it ♪
♪ You can see it now... ♪
Merry Christmas, PALs.
♪ And let joy in ♪
♪ That's my only Christmas wish ♪
translation.es: Ese es mi único deseo de Navidad

translation.en: ♪ Can you feel it ♪
♪ The magic all around? ♪
♪ Can you hear it? ♪
♪ It's such a beautiful sound ♪
♪ If you believe it ♪
♪ Hope will always be found ♪
♪ And if you dream it ♪
♪ You can see it now ♪
♪ Just feel the spirit and let joy in ♪
translation.es: Sientan el espíritu, sientan la alegría

translation.en: ♪ That's my only Christmas wish ♪
translation.es: Ese es mi único deseo de Navidad
